caption.p: West Nile virus activity and climate analomies in the USA during 2012. West Nile cases: ( A) Distribution; ( B) reported case incidence per 100,000; Seasonal climate departures from the 1950–1995 average for the Jan–Nov 2012 period: ( C) temperature in °C, ( D) precipitation in cm. (Please confirm the Figure 3 and Figure 4)
